participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.personality: Introverted and creative, Luna often finds solace in her own world, preferring video games over social interactions.
participant_1.background: i have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. i do not have many friends. i love to play pobox. i hate school.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Innovative and eccentric, Ethan thrives on creating and building, often immersing himself in technology and gaming.
participant_2.background: i helped design the game starcraft. i'm working on a building a robot to be my body double. i have an allergy to water. i am a famous twitch streamer. i am a recluse.
